key.name: swap-mode
key.summary: Behavior when target monitor is occupied
key.description: swap: move the focused window to the target monitor and move the current resident window to the source monitor. push: only move the focused window to the target monitor.

key.name: target-monitor-mode
key.summary: How to choose the target monitor
key.description: primary: use GNOME's primary monitor. fixed: use the monitor index configured in fixed-target-monitor.

key.name: fixed-target-monitor
key.description: Monitor index to use when target-monitor-mode is set to fixed. Indices may change when displays are re-arranged.

key.name: settle-delay-ms
key.summary: Delay before acting after focus changes
key.description: Debounce/settle delay in milliseconds after a focus change before moving windows.

key.name: retry-count
key.description: Number of verification retries after moving windows. Useful with tiling extensions that fight move_to_monitor.

key.name: scope-mode
key.summary: Where to look for the resident window
key.description: focused-workspace: pick the resident window from the focused window's workspace. active-workspace: pick from the current active workspace. all-workspaces: pick from all workspaces (active workspace is preferred).

key.name: ignore-fullscreen
key.description: If enabled, do not move a focused window that is fullscreen and do not displace a fullscreen resident.

key.name: app-blocklist
key.description: List of app identifiers to exclude from moves. Entries can be GNOME app IDs (desktop file IDs) or WM_CLASS strings.
